item.description:
Some people love beer. Some people love chocolate. But the taste they make when you put them together is a delicious taste all its own. But don't take my word for it, come taste for yourself at Watch City when they open the taps on their newest beer - Chocolate Thunder Porter, made with TAZA Chocolate.

According to Watch City Brewing, they were the first brewery ever to win a Medal for a "Chocolate Beer" style beer at the Great American Beer Festival in 1999! Brewer Aaron Mateychuk will be tapping the first batch of many on the 27th around 3:00 p.m. so don't miss out!

About the Chocolate Thunder Porter:
It was made with 55 pounds of locally produced "Taza Chocolate" in Somerville, MA. you bet ...Keep it LOCAL! We added "70% Taza Dark Stone Ground Chocolate" in different points of the brewing process to balance out any bitterness along the way. The final touch was added with using 5 pounds of "Taza Chocolate Mexicano Vanilla Bean" chocolate inline in the conditioning process to overwhelm you with the chocolate experience!
(courtesy of Watch City Brewing)

Or, in other words, your chocolate is in my beer!
item.name: Your Chocolate Is In My Beer!
